opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: In Re Discipline of Levine. No. D-2378

opinion:
543 U.S. 921

IN RE DISCIPLINE OF LEVINE.
No. D-2378.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 12, 2004.

1

Mel Levine, of Phoenix, Ariz., is suspended from the practice of law in this Court, and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
